name: Run Monster Run!
description:
Help Andy and his monster friends jump, boost and discover amazing worlds whilst grabbing tons of treasure along the way! Collect words in each level to help free his monster friends with special powers.

Amazing Features:

- Loads of awesome Levels and Worlds to discover.
- Every level gets harder, let's see if you can make it.
- Every monster has unique special powers - unlock them all!
- Discover the identity of the SECRET characters!
- Collect all the words to earn MEGA rewards
- Brand new game engine with amazing effects!
- Word of the day game launching soon - Keep an eye on our Facebook page
- So much more!

Check out our Facebook page for updates and to get the daily clue for "Word of the Day"
https://www.facebook.com/runmonsterrun
